price: 34. Offspring, one of the other, and Allâh is All-Hearer, All-Knower.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَۢ بَعۡضُهَا مِنۢ بَعۡضٖۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyatan baʿḍuhā min baʿḍin wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
